name: Crafting
description: You craft a nonmagical item. You must have proficiency with the appropriate tools and access to them. For each day of downtime you spend crafting, you can craft items with a total market value of 5 GP, and you must expend raw materials worth half that value.
outcome: Craft items worth up to 5 GP per day

name: Practicing a Profession
description: You work between adventures. If you have proficiency with a tool or musical instrument, you can earn enough to maintain a modest lifestyle. If you have the Performance skill, you can earn enough for a comfortable lifestyle.
outcome: Earn a modest lifestyle (or comfortable with Performance)

name: Recuperating
description: You can use downtime between adventures to recover from a debilitating injury, disease, or poison. After 3 days of rest, you can make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a success, you end one effect on yourself that prevents you from regaining Hit Points, or reduce your Exhaustion level by 1.
outcome: DC 15 CON save: end one effect preventing HP recovery, or reduce Exhaustion by 1

name: Researching
description: You spend your time studying a topic at a library, a sage's residence, or similar location. For each day of research, you must spend 1 GP to cover expenses. The DM determines what you learn.
requirements: Access to a library or knowledgeable source
outcome: DM provides information about the topic researched

name: Training
description: You can spend time between adventures learning a new language or training with a set of tools. You must find an instructor willing to teach you. Training takes 250 days and costs 1 GP per day.
outcome: Learn a new language or gain proficiency with a tool

name: Crafting a Magic Item
description: A character can craft a magic item if they have the appropriate tool proficiency, required spells, and raw materials. The time and cost depend on the item's rarity.
outcome: Create a magic item (time/cost by rarity)

name: Scribing a Spell Scroll
description: A spellcaster can transfer a spell they have prepared to a scroll. The time and cost depend on the spell's level.

name: Brewing a Potion of Healing
description: A character with proficiency in the Herbalism Kit can brew potions of healing. The time and cost depend on the potion type.
